sentences.sContent: Doubt and animadvert are inner motive force of innovation of science and culture.
sentences.sContent_eng: Doubt and animadvert are inner motive force of innovation of science and culture.
sentences.sCn: 怀疑和批判是促进科学与文化不断创新的内推力。

sentences.sContent: Home shows the exposure and animadvert on the feudalistic society, the representation of the love tragedy significance and the aesthetics characteristic of language art.
sentences.sContent_eng: Home shows the exposure and animadvert on the feudalistic society, the representation of the love tragedy significance and the aesthetics characteristic of language art.
sentences.sCn: 《家》无论是小说还是话剧，都有着对封建社会的揭露和批判，爱情悲剧意义的展示以及语言艺术的美学特征。
